## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [asZipper(tree)](./gp.ast.aszipper.md) |  |  |
|  [crossoverSingle(parent1, parent2)](./gp.ast.crossoversingle.md) |  | Immutably transplants a randomly chosen subtree of <code>parent2</code> into a randomly chosen location in <code>parent1</code> and vice versa. Returns 2 new trees. |
|  [linearizedAST(tree)](./gp.ast.linearizedast.md) |  | Returns linearized/flat version of given AST as an array of [zipper locations](./zipper.location.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [mutate(tree, maxDepth)](./gp.ast.mutate.md) |  | Probilistically replaces randomly chosen tree nodes with a new random AST of given <code>maxDepth</code> (default: 1). Never mutates root. |
|  [randomAST(maxDepth)](./gp.ast.randomast.md) |  | Returns a random AST with given max tree depth. The max depth provided in [ASTOpts](./gp.astopts.md) is used by default. |
|  [randomASTNode(d, maxDepth)](./gp.ast.randomastnode.md) |  |  |
|  [selectRandomNode(tree, min, max)](./gp.ast.selectrandomnode.md) |  | Returns random [ASTNode](./gp.astnode.md) from given tree, using the user provided PRNG (via <code>opts</code>) or [SYSTEM](./random.system.md)<!-- -->. The returned value is a [zipper location](./zipper.location.md) of the selected node. |
